message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, you're getting closer! I understand your budget concerns. How about we split the difference and call it $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but no more than that. Can we meet at $12,000?
